{{DEFAULTSORT:Annals Adamarus}}
'''''The Annals Adamarus''''' was a round, ring-bound, runed book with a solid [[silver]] cover. As of [[1374 DR]] it was in [[Blackstaff Tower]] in [[Waterdeep]].
